_source.text: [0070] As is well known to those of skill in the art, it is possible to improve the expression of a nucleic acid sequence in a host cell or organism by replacing the nucleic acids coding for a particular amino acid (i.e. a codon) with another codon which is better expressed in the host organism.

particular amino acid (i.e. a codon) with another codon which **is** **better** expressed in the host organism.
